outputs.output_descr: It aims to contribute to sustainable reduction of poverty and improvement of livelihoods by empowering communities through community institutions, to articulate and address their needs and priorities. It focuses on work with the Government of Kyrgyzstan to support rural development in an integrated, comprehensive, people-focused, inclusive and participatory manner.

project_descr: Poverty reduced through increased access of economically active poor to employment and resources, economic and social empowerment of the vulnerable communities in Batken
